title: Pulled Over by the Cops
description: Anne's new novel, Topsy Turvy, about her life in this unusual new year of 2013 will be published shortly. Pulled Over by the Cops is 4 chapters from that Happy Driving LessonPulled Over by the CopsBad Day at Traffic CourtI Go Before the JudgeThey are real life adventures in Anne's bumpy experience in learning how to drive. Because Anne is New Age her experience of going before the Judge is not like anyone else's. She decides "the outcome doesn't matter, all that matters is that I send love in my mind to everyone in the courtroom."It is a short fun tale illustrated with cartoons by Bill Pyne. It takes place in Tucson Arizona. Anne is a native New Yorker who moved to Tucson with her husband and their dog 20 years ago.She is learning how to drive now. Her good friend Jim is teaching her and not having an easy time of it.
author: Anne Wilensky
